Lyric:
[by:老谭是猪]
[00:02.19]    
[01:47.33]Memories of you still remain

[01:50.08]   
[01:50.83]Though it's been forever

[01:53.95]
   
[01:54.47]Guess there is no other way

[01:57.96]To piece me back together

[02:01.61]Been running from the light

[02:03.59]Still seem me goodbye

[02:05.45]Been hiding in the darkness

[02:08.58]   
[02:09.13]Can't be healed by time

[02:10.98]Guess this house of mine

[02:12.84]Forever will be haunted

[02:16.32]I close my eyes

[02:19.91]But dare not sleep

[02:23.12]
   
[02:23.65]You made my dreams

[02:27.20]
   
[02:28.95]Like a Ghost In The Machine 

[02:32.60]All the years go by

[02:35.73]   
[02:36.39]And we do not speak

[02:39.85]You still fill my mind

[02:43.19]   
[02:43.81]Like a Ghost In The Machine 
[02:47.78]   
[03:02.28]Like a Ghost In The Machine
